items.title: Ripple sets out $RLUSD pillars and XRP Ledger privacy plans as stablecoin cap hits $302 billion
items.excerpt: Ripple outlined core pillars for $RLUSD—interoperability, transparency and scale—and previewed privacy enhancements for the XRP Ledger via RippleX’s Confidential MPT. The update arrives as the stablecoin market cap reaches $302 billion, according to CoinMarketCap.
